name: Green Abishai
resistance: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The abishai's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: alter self, major image * 3/day each: charm person, detect thoughts, fear * 1/day each: confusion, dominate person, mass suggestion

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical. Actions

traits.name: Multiattack
traits.desc: The abishai makes two attacks, one with its claws and one with its longsword, or it casts one spell from its Innate Spellcasting trait and makes one claw attack.

traits.name: Longsword
traits.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Claws
traits.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) poison damage and become poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
